item.title: LifeSource: Music in an Age of Therapeutic Anxiety
item.author: sciredomir@tutanota.com (Mahan)
item.description: A critique of modern psychology’s foundations and flaws—from the replication crisis to its gendered biases—and a meditation on how the Persian concept of ‘Ravān’ and the experience of music offer a more profound path to integration and wholeness.
